propsSchema.items: Array<{ trigger: string, content: React.ReactNode, imageOne?: string, videoOne?: string, imageAltOne?: string, videoAriaLabelOne?: string, imageTwo?: string, videoTwo?: string, imageAltTwo?: string, videoAriaLabelTwo?: string }> - Timeline items with triggers and dual phone media (required)
propsSchema.showTextBox?: boolean (default: true - controls whether CardStackTextBox renders)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)
propsSchema.titleImageWrapperClassName?: string - For styling image wrapper in inline-image layout
propsSchema.titleImageClassName?: string - For styling images in inline-image layout
